theBrewmaster:CelestialBrew.NAME: Celestial Brew
theBrewmaster:CelestialBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Discard your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:Microbrew.NAME: Microbrew
theBrewmaster:Microbrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Permanently transforms into a random common Brew card when upgraded.

theBrewmaster:QuickSip.NAME: Quick Sip
theBrewmaster:QuickSip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Draw a card.

theBrewmaster:PerplexingBrew.NAME: Perplexing Brew
theBrewmaster:PerplexingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !theBrewmaster:M2! Strength, Thorns, or Dexterity, chosen at random when played.
theBrewmaster:PerplexingBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !theBrewmaster:M2! {!theBrewmaster:perplexing!|@=Strength, Thorns, or Dexterity, chosen at random when drawn.|0=Strength.|1=Thorns.|2=Dexterity.}

theBrewmaster:DoubleFist.NAME: Double Fist
theBrewmaster:DoubleFist.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Brew card is played twice.

theBrewmaster:FluidMotion.NAME: Fluid Motion
theBrewmaster:FluidMotion.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose thebrewmaster:Intoxication, gain that much Block.

theBrewmaster:Homebrew.NAME: Homebrew
theBrewmaster:Homebrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. This card gains !theBrewmaster:M2! thebrewmaster:Intoxication when drawn until played.

theBrewmaster:Belch.NAME: Belch
theBrewmaster:Belch.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak. NL Exhaust unless thebrewmaster:Intoxicated.

theBrewmaster:DrunkenFist.NAME: Drunken Fist
theBrewmaster:DrunkenFist.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! % of your intoxication. Deal that much damage.

theBrewmaster:FortifyingBrew.NAME: Fortifying Brew
theBrewmaster:FortifyingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Gain double that amount instead.

theBrewmaster:SoberUp.NAME: Sober Up
theBrewmaster:SoberUp.DESCRIPTION: Consume 100 % of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication. Gain [E] and draw 1 card for every !M! consumed. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:VinoVeritas.NAME: Vino Veritas
theBrewmaster:VinoVeritas.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Draw two additional cards.

theBrewmaster:Stagger.NAME: Stagger
theBrewmaster:Stagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, it loses !M! Strength this turn.

theBrewmaster:PurifyingBrew.NAME: Purifying Brew
theBrewmaster:PurifyingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. If it is a Status card, gain !M! Block.
theBrewmaster:PurifyingBrew.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. If it is a [#7fff00]Status or Curse[] card, gain !M! Block.

theBrewmaster:PocketFlask.NAME: Pocket Flask
theBrewmaster:PocketFlask.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Brew, gain 10 thebrewmaster:Intoxication.

theBrewmaster:KSKeg.NAME: Keg
theBrewmaster:KSKeg.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 [#edc651]Smash[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSKeg.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 [#7fff00]Smash+[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:KSKegP.NAME: Keg
theBrewmaster:KSKegP.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 [#edc651]Smash[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSKegP.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 [#7fff00]Smash+[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:KSSmash.NAME: Smash
theBrewmaster:KSSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 [#edc651]Keg[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSSmash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 [#7fff00]Keg+[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:KSSmashP.NAME: Smash
theBrewmaster:KSSmashP.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 [#edc651]Keg[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSSmashP.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 [#7fff00]Keg+[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:Binge.NAME: Binge
theBrewmaster:Binge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. Add a copy of this card with Ethereal and Exhaust to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. Add a copy of this card to your hand.

theBrewmaster:HappyHour.NAME: Happy Hour
theBrewmaster:HappyHour.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of Brew cards in your hand by 1 this turn.

theBrewmaster:AdmiralsBrew.NAME: Admiral's Brew
theBrewmaster:AdmiralsBrew.DESCRIPTION: Prevent all unblocked damage taken by half. Take prevented damage at the end of !M! turns.

theBrewmaster:FairyBrew.NAME: Fairy Brew
theBrewmaster:FairyBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Gain !theBrewmaster:M2! life instead. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:ExplodingKeg.NAME: Exploding Keg
theBrewmaster:ExplodingKeg.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy and !M! damage to the rest.

theBrewmaster:StormStomp.NAME: Storm Stomp
theBrewmaster:StormStomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

theBrewmaster:Vasoimmolation.NAME: Vasoimmolation
theBrewmaster:Vasoimmolation.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal 20 % of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication as damage to yourself and all enemies.
theBrewmaster:Vasoimmolation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal 20 % of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication as damage to [#7fff00]all enemies.[]

theBrewmaster:Formulation.NAME: Formulation
theBrewmaster:Formulation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Brew card. Obtain a random potion. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:Formulation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Exhaust a Brew card. Obtain a random potion. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:DrunkenFlurry.NAME: Drunken Flurry
theBrewmaster:DrunkenFlurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. Repeat for each !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication you have.

theBrewmaster:ThickSkin.NAME: Thick Skin
theBrewmaster:ThickSkin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain thebrewmaster:Intoxication equal to remaining block at the start of your next turn.

theBrewmaster:Temperance.NAME: Temperance
theBrewmaster:Temperance.DESCRIPTION: If you would gain thebrewmaster:Intoxication, gain !M! Strength instead.

theBrewmaster:TwistedBrew.NAME: Twisted Brew
theBrewmaster:TwistedBrew.DESCRIPTION: Transform a random card in your hand.

theBrewmaster:StoneBrew.NAME: Stone Brew
theBrewmaster:StoneBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Double your current block.

theBrewmaster:NimbleBrew.NAME: Nimble Brew
theBrewmaster:NimbleBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. At the end of your turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

theBrewmaster:DrunkenLuck.NAME: Drunkard's Luck
theBrewmaster:DrunkenLuck.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL When this card is exhausted, gain !M! Gold.

theBrewmaster:CranialBash.NAME: Cranial Bash
theBrewmaster:CranialBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. Randomize the costs of all cards in your hand for the rest of the combat.

theBrewmaster:DionysianForm.NAME: Dionysian Form
theBrewmaster:DionysianForm.DESCRIPTION: At the beggining of your turn, add a random Brew card into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
theBrewmaster:DionysianForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the beggining of your turn, add a random upgraded Brew card into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

theBrewmaster:DrunkenRage.NAME: Drunken Rage
theBrewmaster:DrunkenRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only play if thebrewmaster:Intoxicated

theBrewmaster:TipsyStrike.NAME: Tipsy Strike
theBrewmaster:TipsyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! plus !M! % of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication damage.

theBrewmaster:StoneSmash.NAME: Stone Smash
theBrewmaster:StoneSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

theBrewmaster:BarrelThrough.NAME: Barrel Through
theBrewmaster:BarrelThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to each enemy. NL Gain !B! Block.

theBrewmaster:VolatileBrew.NAME: Volatile Brew
theBrewmaster:VolatileBrew.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal {!Location!|@= !D! damage.|>0,<0=8, 12, or 20 damage, chosen at random when drawn.}
theBrewmaster:VolatileBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal {!Location!|@= !D! damage.|>0,<0=12, 20, or 36 damage, chosen at random when drawn.}

theBrewmaster:ImportedBrew.NAME: Imported Brew
theBrewmaster:ImportedBrew.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from different colors to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:ImportedBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 upgraded cards from different colors to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:EthanolVapors.NAME: Ethanol Vapors
theBrewmaster:EthanolVapors.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Intoxication, apply !M! thebrewmaster:Drenched to a random enemy.

theBrewmaster:BloodAlcohol.NAME: Blood Alcohol
theBrewmaster:BloodAlcohol.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose life, gain that much thebrewmaster:Intoxication.

theBrewmaster:Misplace.NAME: Misplace
theBrewmaster:Misplace.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a card from your hand into your draw pile.
theBrewmaster:Misplace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your draw pile.

theBrewmaster:GutFermentation.NAME: Gut Fermentation
theBrewmaster:GutFermentation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Exhaust if thebrewmaster:Intoxicated.

theBrewmaster:Impulse.NAME: Impulsivity
theBrewmaster:Impulse.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. They gain Ethereal this turn.

theBrewmaster:WhiskeyKick.NAME: Whiskey Kick
theBrewmaster:WhiskeyKick.DESCRIPTION: Draw !D! damage. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Deal twice that amount instead.
theBrewmaster:WhiskeyKick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !D! damage. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Deal three times that amount instead.

theBrewmaster:DetonatorStrike.NAME: Detonator Strike
theBrewmaster:DetonatorStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M!x amount of thebrewmaster:Drenched as damage.

theBrewmaster:DrunkenBrawler.NAME: Drunken Brawler
theBrewmaster:DrunkenBrawler.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack card, your next Attack does !M! % of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication as bonus damage.

theBrewmaster:TopsyTurvy.NAME: Topsy Turvy
theBrewmaster:TopsyTurvy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak to yourself and target enemy.

theBrewmaster:Pregame.NAME: Pregame
theBrewmaster:Pregame.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:RumRun.NAME: Rum Run
theBrewmaster:RumRun.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Double this card's Block and increase it's cost by 1 this combat.

theBrewmaster:BelligerentRoar.NAME: Belligerent Roar
theBrewmaster:BelligerentRoar.DESCRIPTION: Stun an enemy. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Stun each enemy. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:BelligerentRoar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stun an enemy. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Stun each enemy.
